alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Interior Valleys; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 7:22AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marin, northwestern Contra Costa and eastern San Francisco Counties through 745 AM PST... At 722 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near American Canyon to 19 miles southwest of Stinson Beach. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally intense rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, Daly City, Alameda, San Rafael, Novato, Martinez, Pleasant Hill, San Pablo, Lafayette, El Cerrito, Hercules, American Canyon, Albany, Pinole, Mill Valley and San Anselmo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
